name: Query Slack Channel History with Natural Language using OpenAI

user.name: Robert Breen
user.bio: Professional services consultant with over 10 years of experience solving complex business problems across industries. I specialize in n8n and process automation‚Äîdesigning custom workflows that integrate tools like Google Calendar, Airtable, GPT, and internal systems. Whether you need to automate scheduling, sync data, or streamline operations, I build solutions that save time and drive results.

description:
Chat with a Slack channel using AI. This workflow fetches the channel‚Äôs message history and lets you ask natural-language questions (‚Äúwhat were the decisions?‚Äù, ‚Äúwho‚Äôs blocked?‚Äù, ‚Äúsummarize yesterday‚Äù). The assistant **only** answers from the channel‚Äôs actual messages‚Äîno guessing.

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Setup Instructions

### 1Ô∏è‚É£ Set Up OpenAI Connection
1. Go to [OpenAI Platform](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys)  
2. Navigate to [OpenAI Billing](https://platform.openai.com/settings/organization/billing/overview)  
3. Add funds to your billing account  
4. Copy your API key into the **OpenAI credentials** in n8n

### 2Ô∏è‚É£ Connect Slack API
1. Create an app ‚Üí <https://api.slack.com/apps>  
2. **OAuth & Permissions** ‚Üí add scopes you need to read channel history (typical:  
   `channels:history`, `groups:history`, `im:history`, `mpim:history`, plus `channels:read`, `groups:read`, `users:read`. Add `chat:write` if you want the bot to reply in Slack.)  
3. **Install** the app to your workspace ‚Üí copy the **Bot User OAuth Token**  
4. In n8n ‚Üí **Credentials ‚Üí New ‚Üí Slack OAuth2 API** ‚Üí paste token and save  
5. In the **Slack History** node, select your Slack credential and the **Channel ID** to read

---

## üó£Ô∏è Example Questions You Can Ask
- ‚ÄúGive me a 5-bullet summary of the last 24 hours.‚Äù  
- ‚ÄúWhat action items were assigned, and to whom?‚Äù  
- ‚ÄúList open questions that haven‚Äôt been answered yet.‚Äù  
- ‚ÄúWho was mentioned most this week?‚Äù  
- ‚ÄúSummarize decisions from the last sprint planning.‚Äù  
- ‚ÄúShow messages with the word ‚Äòblocker‚Äô from the past 2 days.‚Äù  
- ‚ÄúWhat files/links were shared today?‚Äù

---

options.systemMessage: You are a helpful assistant. For all questions, get the slack channel history from the slack history tool. Do not make anythign up. Use only data in the slack tool to answer questions.

# üí¨ Slack Channel Chatbot (n8n + OpenAI)

Chat with a Slack channel using AI. This workflow fetches the channel‚Äôs message history and lets you ask natural-language questions (‚Äúwhat were the decisions?‚Äù, ‚Äúwho‚Äôs blocked?‚Äù, ‚Äúsummarize yesterday‚Äù). The assistant **only** answers from the channel‚Äôs actual messages‚Äîno guessing.

### 1Ô∏è‚É£ Set Up OpenAI Connection
1. Go to [OpenAI Platform](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys)  
2. Navigate to [OpenAI Billing](https://platform.openai.com/settings/organization/billing/overview)  
3. Add funds to your billing account  
4. Copy your API key into the **OpenAI credentials** in n8n
